local_intent: Align on cloth and execute a controlled 0.1 m push along the cloth edge at 180° yaw=90°, then stabilize.
assumptions: Cloth is visible and within reach
Surface is clear and planar for pushing
Safe to apply gentle contact during push
coherence_with_global: Follows detect → align → set yaw → push → brief wait, matching the global fold-by-push sequence and parameters.
